metadata.name: Process Deletion of Its Own Executable
metadata.comment: Detects the deletion of a process's executable by itself. This is usually not possible without workarounds and may be used by malware to hide its traces.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND LOWER(file.path) = LOWER(actor.process.name))

output.summary: Detects the deletion of a process's executable by itself. This is usually not possible without workarounds and may be used by malware to hide its traces.

metadata.objective: False positive: Some false positives are to be expected from uninstallers. Reference: https://github.com/joaoviictorti/RustRedOps/tree/ce04369a246006d399e8c61d9fe0e6b34f988a49/Self_Deletion
